title: Fallen Form
name: Nyximera - Fallen Form
printed_effect:
This Nyximera cannot be targeted by Invoke
Runes. During your opponent’s End Phase you
must either send this Nyximera to the Underworld
or Special Ascend it to Nyximera-Risen Form
from your hand, deck, or Underworld.
effect: This Nyximera cannot be targeted by Invoke Runes. During your opponent's End Phase you must either send this Nyximera to the Underworld or Special Ascend it to Nyximera-Risen Form from your hand, deck, or Underworld.
